items.raw_desc: Konzol PlayStation 5 (Slim) - 1TB - Ghost of Yotei: Gold Limited Edition:PlayStation 5 (Slim) Ghost of Yotei: Gold Limited EditionInspired by the story of Atsu, the limited edition PS5 is a visual gem that combines modern gaming technology with traditional Japanese aesthetics. The majestic Mount Yotei is reflected on the console cover,a symbol of Hokkaido and the heroine herself, and the delicate kintsugi-style lines are reminiscent of the strength that is born from overcoming the wounds of fate.
